s0022: After half a year, people all raised their own chariots.
s0023: This did not teach yet people followed their transformation, near ones saw and imitated, far ones from four sides gazed and modeled after.
s0024: Therefore three times obtained prime minister yet not happy, knew his talent self-obtained;
s0025: Three times left prime minister yet not regretted, knew not his own crime.
s0026: Zi Chan was Zheng's ranking grand master.
s0027: During Zheng Zhao Jun's time, because he favored Xu Zhi as prime minister, state was chaotic, superiors and inferiors not close, fathers and sons not harmonious.
s0028: Da Gong Zi Qi spoke to the jun, made Zi Chan prime minister.
s0029: As prime minister one year, youths did not play improperly, elderly did not carry burdens, children did not plow boundaries.
s0030: Two years, market not falsely priced.
s0031: Three years, gates not closed at night, roads not picked up lost items.
s0032: Four years, farming tools not returned.
s0033: Five years, scholars no false records, mourning periods not commanded yet orderly.
s0034: Governed Zheng twenty six years and died, able-bodied men wailed, elders wept like children, said: 'Zi Chan leaves us to die!
s0037: Gong Yi Xiu was a Lu doctor.
s0038: With high merit became Lu prime minister.
s0039: Devoted to law following principle, no changes, hundred officials self-corrected.
s0040: Made salary receivers not compete with common people for profit, receiving great not take small.
s0041: Guest had one who gifted prime minister fish, prime minister not receive.
s0042: Guest said: 'Heard jun likes fish, gifted jun fish, why not receive?'
s0043: Prime minister said: 'Because like fish, therefore not receive.
s0044: Now as prime minister, can self-supply fish;
s0045: Now receive fish and resign, who again supply me fish?
s0048: Ate greens yet beautiful, pulled his garden mallows and abandoned them.
s0049: Saw his family weave cloth well, and angrily expelled his family woman, burned her loom, said 'want to make farmers scholars artisans women where sell their goods?'
s0050: Shi She was Chu Zhao Wang's prime minister.
s0051: Firm upright incorruptible, no partiality avoidance.
s0052: Patrolling commandery, road had murderer, prime minister pursued, was his father.
s0053: Released his father and returned self-bound.
s0054: Made person speak to wang: 'Murderer, minister's father.
s0055: With father establish politics, not filial;
s0056: Waste law release crime, not loyal;
s0058: Wang said: 'Pursued yet not caught, should not bear crime, son manage affairs.'
s0059: Shi She said: 'Not favor own father, not filial son;
s0060: Not follow jun law, not loyal minister.
s0061: Wang pardon his crime, upper benevolence;
s0063: Then not accept order, self-cut throat die.
s0064: Li Li was Jin Wen Gong's judge.
s0065: Mistakenly heard killed person, self-bound deserved death.
s0066: Wen Gong said: 'Official has noble base, punishment has light heavy.
s0067: Lower official has error, not son's crime.'
s0068: Li Li said: 'Minister dwell official as chief, not with officials yield position;
s0069: Receive salary as many, not with below divide profit.
s0070: Now mistaken heard kill person, shift crime to lower official, not what heard.'
s0072: Wen Gong said: 'Son then self consider have crime, sha ren also have crime?'
s0073: Li Li said: 'Judge has law, lose punishment then punish, lose death then death.
s0074: Gong with minister able listen subtle decide doubt, therefore make judge.
s0075: Now mistaken heard kill person, crime deserves death.'
s0076: Then not accept order, prostrate sword die.
s0077: Grand Historian said: Sun Shu Ao exit one word, Ying market restore.
s0078: Zi Chan sick die, Zheng people wail cry.
s0079: Gong Yi Zi see good cloth yet family woman expel.
s0080: Shi She release father yet die, Chu Zhao name establish.
s0081: Li Li mistaken kill yet prostrate sword, Jin Wen with correct state law.
